java/liquibase/database/sql/DeleteStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 
00005 import java.util.ArrayList;
00006 import java.util.Date;
00007 import java.util.List;
00008 
00009 public class DeleteStatement implements SqlStatement {
00010     private String schemaName;
00011     private String tableName;
00012     private String whereClause;
00013     private List<Object> whereParameters = new ArrayList<Object>();
00014 
00015 
00016     public DeleteStatement(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00017         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00018         this.tableName = tableName;
00019     }
00020 
00021     public String getSchemaName() {
00022         return schemaName;
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getTableName() {
00026         return tableName;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public String getWhereClause() {
00030         return whereClause;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public DeleteStatement setWhereClause(String whereClause) {
00034         this.whereClause = whereClause;
00035 
00036         return this;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public void addWhereParameter(Object value) {
00040         this.whereParameters.add(value);
00041     }
00042 
00043 
00044     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00045         return true;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) {
00049         StringBuffer sql = new StringBuffer("DELETE FROM "+database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()));
00050 
00051         if (whereClause != null) {
00052             String fixedWhereClause = " WHERE "+whereClause;
00053             for (Object param : whereParameters) {
00054                 fixedWhereClause = fixedWhereClause.replaceFirst("\\?", convertToString(param, database));
00055             }
00056             sql.append(" ").append(fixedWhereClause);
00057         }
00058 
00059         return sql.toString();
00060     }
00061 
00062     private String convertToString(Object newValue, Database database) {
00063         String sqlString;
00064         if (newValue == null) {
00065             sqlString = "NULL";
00066         } else if (newValue instanceof String && database.shouldQuoteValue(((String) newValue))) {
00067             sqlString = "'"+newValue+"'";
00068         } else if (newValue instanceof Date) {
00069             sqlString = database.getDateLiteral(((Date) newValue));
00070         } else if (newValue instanceof Boolean) {
00071             if (((Boolean) newValue)) {
00072                 sqlString = database.getTrueBooleanValue();
00073             } else {
00074                 sqlString = database.getFalseBooleanValue();
00075             }
00076         } else {
00077             sqlString = newValue.toString();
00078         }
00079         return sqlString;
00080     }
00081 
00082     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00083         return ";";
00084     }
00085 }
